articles.title: 36 Products With Before-And-Afters That'll Make You Say 'No Way' To Your Screen
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Nivea introduced a lightweight gel cream with Q10. L'Oréal Paris offers a BB Cream as an alternative to Dr Jart+ Cicapair. Catrice launched an 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener. Bissell introduced stain-removing pads for pet stains. Mielle launched Rosemary Mint strengthening oil. Zesty Paws offers an allergy supplement with probiotics. Roc has a retinol night cream with squalene. Venus Visage has a teeth-whitening pen. Ogx offers Argan Oil of Morocco Curl-Defining Cream. Juno & Co. launched Clean 10 Cleansing Balm. Howard Products introduced Feed-N-Wax wood polish and conditioner. Etude offers Dear Darling Water Tint. Essence offers Lash Princess mascara. E.l.f offers Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara.

articles.title: Trader Joe's Opens New Store in New Orleans This Week
articles.author: Site Staff
articles.summary: Trader Joe's is opening a new store in New Orleans on August 14th. The 9683 sq. ft. store, located at 2501 Tulane Ave., will be the third Trader Joe's in Louisiana, employing 80 new local crew members. The store will also donate unsold products to local non-profits through the Neighborhood Shares Program.

articles.title: Innovation Is Not About Technology Alone
articles.author: Maxwell Ampong
articles.summary: Maxwell Logistics digitized cross-border permit processing between Ghana and Burkina Faso, saving time and money for commodity shipments. WellMax Inclusive Insurance designed its insurance product and the language around it to build trust with customers, using stories and human voices to avoid jargon and create a positive customer experience.

articles.title: Butter Made from Carbon and Backed by Bill Gates Criticized for Its Unappealing Taste
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Savor, backed by Bill Gates, is developing a synthetic butter made from carbon, hydrogen, and oxygen, aiming for a 2025 launch in restaurants and bakeries, followed by retail availability in 2027. The company claims the product reduces emissions by converting carbon dioxide and hydrogen into fat molecules that mimic conventional butter.

articles.title: Xiao-I Corporation Celebrates Eight Consecutive Years Empowering Premium Kitchen Appliance Leader with AI-Driven Customer Experience  Aug. 11, 2025 21:15
articles.summary: Xiao-I Corporation's iBot and IKBase platform provides intelligence to unify customer engagement, empower staff, and optimize complex operational chains. This powers intelligent chatbots on e-commerce platforms and brand websites and also equips field service technicians with AI assistance.

articles.title: Henry Halfhead: A Delightfully Quirky Adventure Coming September
articles.author: Alfredo Robelo
articles.summary: Lululu Entertainment is launching its new sandbox adventure game, Henry Halfhead, on September 16, 2025, for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch. The game will be available for $12.99 USD, with a launch discount of 25% for a limited time. The game features Henry, who can transform into over 250 different objects, offering playful solutions to challenges.

articles.title: AI reshapes SEO: Alloy Digital's 4-step plan to boost visibility and combat AI-driven disruption in search
articles.author: Alloy Digital
articles.summary: Alloy Digital offers a Modern SEO service which combines SEO, GEO, Data Analysis, and Strategic Thinking. They utilize Pillar Content strategy, and data analysis to improve website performance and increase qualified leads for their clients. Alloy Digital optimizes websites for both traditional search and AI-generated results.

articles.title: Ditch the dust for good — this 'powerful and convenient' electric duster is 60% off on Amazon
articles.author: Blair Stutz
articles.summary: The Compressed Electric Air Duster, a rechargeable and cordless cleaning gadget, has been launched as an alternative to canned air. It features a 100,000 RPM motor, USB-C fast charging, and multiple attachments for versatile cleaning. It is being offered with a limited time discount on Amazon Canada.

articles.title: Zaxby's continues western expansion with new location opening this week
articles.author: Saleen Martin
articles.summary: Zaxby's is expanding its western presence by opening its first Arizona location in San Tan Valley on August 13. The new 3,000-square-foot location features 56 seats, a dual drive-thru, and curbside pickup. Zaxby's plans to open its 1,000th location in 2025 and more than 50 new locations across the US.

articles.title: INTERVIEW: 2027 Luke Wilson SPILLS on Oklahoma Commitment
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers streaming service on phones. Users can access the KENS 5 stream through the KENS 5 app.

articles.title: Little Luxuries Are Important, So Let Me Introduce You To A Few Of Our Favourite Body Oils From Canadian Brands
articles.author: Alice Prendergast
articles.summary: Rocky, Sahajan, and Everist, among other Canadian brands, offer body oils designed to deeply moisturize and nourish skin. These oils cater to various preferences and budgets, providing options for consumers seeking effective skincare solutions.

articles.title: Pokémon Sleep Could Get Major Feature Fans Have Been Asking for Since Launch
articles.author: Brent Koepp
articles.summary: A patent suggests that Pokémon Sleep might introduce a new trading system, allowing users to exchange Pokémon and items. The patent describes that Pokémon associated with a user may be traded or transferred to other users. The introduction of Pokémon Home is also discussed for implementation.

articles.title: M&S's 'really pretty' £40 dress that's 'perfect for hot summer days'
articles.author: Jodie Bradley
articles.summary: M&S has introduced the Lyocell Rich Printed Ruffle Midi Cami Dress, priced at £39.50, which is designed for summer wear. Nobody's Child is offering the Black Scoop Back Sarah Mini Dress for £75, and New Look features the Smock Mini Dress for £15.99.

articles.title: Biggest school district in San Antonio welcomes back students
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers streaming on phones via the KENS 5 app. Users can access the streaming service by downloading the application.

articles.title: Get Samsung's newest phone models on sale, from the Galaxy Z Fold7 to Galaxy A56
articles.author: Christopher Murray
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced several new smartphone models including the Galaxy Z Fold7 with foldable technology and an advanced camera, the Galaxy Z Flip7 with a customizable FlexWindow and Gemini integration, the Galaxy S25 Ultra with Google Gemini and an AI camera, the Galaxy S25 Edge with a 200MP camera, the budget-friendly Galaxy A56 with a triple-lens camera, and the Galaxy A16 with health insights. All models are available on Samsung's site and Amazon.

articles.title: How to Style a Bob Haircut for a Totally Effortless Look
articles.summary: The content highlights several products used to style bob haircuts for different hair types. GHD Chronos Styler 1-Inch Flatiron and Briogeo Farewell Frizz Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Cream are recommended for straight hair, while Ouidad 3-in-1 Universal Diffuser and Kérastase Curl Manifesto Crème de Jour Fondamentale Hair Cream are suggested for curly hair. For wavy hair, Remington Pro 1" Curling Wand and Oribe Dry Texturizing Spray can be used.

articles.title: The 5 best Dyson Airwrap alternatives we tested that don't cost $600
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares several hair styling tools that serve as alternatives to Dyson products. Shark's FlexStyle offers similar features to the Dyson Airwrap at a lower price, while wavytalk's 5-in-1 Curling Iron Set provides versatility on a budget. L'Oreal's AirLight Pro Hair Dryer competes with the Dyson Supersonic, emphasizing faster drying and customized settings. Drybar's All-Inclusive 8-in-1 Multi-Styler and T3 Aire 360 Multi-Styler & Blowout System present all-in-one styling solutions, providing multiple styling options with a single device.

articles.title: Amazon Devices & Services Achieves Major Step Toward Zero-Touch Manufacturing With NVIDIA AI and Digital Twins (Nvidia Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Amazon Devices & Services is leveraging NVIDIA digital twin technologies. This collaboration powers advancements in manufacturing. The advancement includes the development of a new physical AI software solution.

articles.title: Texas Rangers offense lets down pitching again as Philadelphia Phillies sweep
articles.summary: KAGS introduced the KAGS app for streaming KAGS content on mobile phones.

articles.title: DJI's Surprising Robot Vacuum Is Built on Drone Technology
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: DJI launched Romo, a robot vacuum cleaner, entering a new product category.

articles.title: Enterprise Merchandising, Now Native on Shopify
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Crownpeak has launched the Fredhopper Product Discovery Shopify App, which provides AI search, personalized recommendations, and visual merchandising for Shopify Enterprise merchants. The app is designed for brands with large catalogs and storefronts, offering control, speed, and intelligence in digital storefronts by native integration, reducing time to value and eliminating the need for complex workarounds.

articles.title: Latest on Project Marvel + Spurs' Mitch Johnson's odds to win Coach of the Year
articles.summary: KENS 5 launched the KENS 5 app. The KENS 5 app allows users to stream KENS 5 content on their phones.

articles.title: Elon Musk shares ‘OpenAI moment' with Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, but there's a ‘twist'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: xAI, Elon Musk's AI company, has launched 'Grok Imagine,' a new feature of the Grok chatbot. This feature enables users to generate short videos with sound from text prompts or images. 'Grok Imagine' is currently available on the Grok iOS app and is being rolled out to Android users.

articles.title: DRAFT Stefon Diggs, Calvin Ridley, and Jakobi Meyers as SLEEPERS? Fantasy football WR rankings, 31-45 for 2025
articles.summary: KAGS launched the KAGS app, allowing users to stream KAGS content on their phones. The app provides mobile access to KAGS services.

articles.title: Next's 'lovely' Midi Dress hailed as 'perfect for summer' by delighted shoppers
articles.author: Ruairi Scott Byrne
articles.summary: Next's Puff Sleeve Midi Dress is gaining popularity, receiving five-star reviews for comfort and design, and is available in white floral, yellow, and teal. M&S has also introduced the Pure Cotton Square Neck Midaxi Dress for autumn.

articles.title: WSPER Wins LAUNCHPAD STartUP Northshore
articles.author: Kelly Hite
articles.summary: WSPER launched its smart panic button and sensor technology, offering LTE-connected, battery-powered devices that operate independently of local infrastructure. Their Connect Hub can modernize legacy wired sensors by integrating them into a cloud-connected system, adding intelligence and automation to existing setups.

articles.title: Periocream: The Future Commercial Winner for bonyf
articles.author: Pharmiweb
articles.summary: bonyf NV launched Periocream on August 11, 2025. bonyf NV believes this high-end product will significantly improve the company's prospects within 18 months.

articles.title: How the Shark FlexStyle has me skipping those trendy $25 blowouts: My review
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: The Shark FlexStyle, a new hair styling and drying system, is reviewed as a versatile and more affordable alternative to the Dyson Airwrap. It features multiple attachments for different hair types and styles, including curlers, brushes, and a concentrator, and offers a compact design suitable for travel. The review highlights its effective drying speed, frizz reduction, and customizable bundles, positioning it as a solid contender in the hair tool market.

articles.title: Small enough to store, cheap enough to score — Instant Pot Pro is 41% off
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: The Instant Pot Pro, a multifunctional electric pressure cooker with 10-in-1 capabilities, is currently 41% off on Amazon. The 8-quart size is suitable for large batches, and it functions as a slow cooker, pressure cooker, rice maker, steamer, and yogurt incubator.

articles.title: The €16.99 Aldi Ireland buy that ‘keeps your car clean' with 3 accessories – and it comes with extra perks for travel
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland has launched the Ride+Go Cordless Car Vacuum, priced at €16.99, which features a HEPA filter, LED lighting, and Type-C charging. The company is also offering the Ride+Go All-In-One Car Cleaning Brush for €9.99 with Chenille and PET Brush options. These cleaning items are available in stores nationwide while stocks last.

articles.title: 5 easy tips to make back-to-school a breeze
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: LG is promoting several of its home appliances to help families manage back-to-school routines. The LG CordZero™ Q3 cordless stick vacuum allows for quick cleaning on various surfaces. The LG WashTower™ Combo washer and dryer simplifies laundry tasks with its large capacity and AI-powered settings. The LG STUDIO Styler steam-closet system refreshes and deodorizes clothing, ensuring a neat appearance.

articles.title: Ninja's latest ice cream maker has never been cheaper
articles.author: Brandt Ranj
articles.summary: Ninja introduced the Swirl, a 2-in-1 ice cream machine capable of making both soft serve and hard-packed ice cream, along with milkshakes, gelato, and frozen yogurt. The Swirl extends Ninja's Creami line and is compatible with existing Creami recipes, offering a variety of options, including non-dairy, high protein, and low-calorie versions.

articles.title: Kanye West unveils new Yeezy footwear, priced at $20; will ship in 6-13 weeks
articles.author: El Paso Times
articles.summary: Yeezy has re-released its SLPRS footwear, also known as SL-01, a foam-like slipper priced at $20. The black slipper is available for purchase on yeezy.com. The Yeezy Slide is also available.

articles.title: ASUS fragrance mouse review: Solid performance with a scented twist
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: ASUS launched the Fragrance Mouse MD101, a wireless mouse featuring an embedded fragrance, priced at Rs 1,999. The mouse boasts an ergonomic design, customizable DPI up to 4800, reliable wireless performance, and a month-long battery life.

articles.title: New product is a ‘game-changer'
articles.author: McPherson Media Group
articles.summary: CNH has launched a new product aimed at boosting business efficiency and productivity for farming operations. The company positions this new offering as a 'game-changer' for the agricultural sector.

articles.title: Overhyped, Underwhelming: GPT-5's Missed Moment
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT 5 as a major AI leap, described as superior in reasoning and writing compared to previous models. However, the launch involved the removal of older models, frustrating users who found the new model's responses shorter and less personal, with more restrictive usage.

articles.title: Walmart shoppers are losing their minds over this $350 ice maker machine - It's on sale for $180
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Simzlife Nugget Ice Maker Countertop at a discounted price of $180, reduced from $350. The ice maker features a 1.8L water tank, a 2.65 lbs ice basket, soft chewable nugget ice production, and an automatic self-cleaning function.

articles.title: Chat Offline on Android: How It Works Without the Internet
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is generating buzz with reports of its upcoming Galaxy S25 Edge, featuring a radical redesign with an exceptionally slim profile. Leaked details suggest the device will emphasize display technology and materials science, potentially challenging Apple's anticipated 'iPhone Air'. The Galaxy S25 Edge aims to address consumer demand for powerful and easy-to-hold devices.

articles.title: Dawlance Exports First Batch of Single Tub Washing Machines from Pakistan to Bangladesh
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Dawlance, a subsidiary of Beko, has begun exporting its Single Tub Washing Machines from Pakistan to Bangladesh. The first phase involved shipping 180 units, with plans for further exports after testing and validation by Singer Bangladesh. This initiative aims to bring locally relevant solutions to a global scale and strengthen Pakistan's manufacturing footprint.

articles.title: Optimal Blue's New Brand Reflects Its Modern Technology and Proven Expertise and Leadership
articles.author: Optimal Blue
articles.summary: Optimal Blue launched a new brand featuring a new logo, visual identity, and messaging, emphasizing its market leadership and role as a trusted partner in the capital markets ecosystem. The new brand aims to reflect Optimal Blue's modern technology and proven expertise, highlighting the company's innovation and legacy of accuracy.

articles.title: Tom Holland Suits Up in SPIDER-MAN: BRAND NEW DAY Filming Clip
articles.summary: Sony Pictures is filming Spider-Man: Brand New Day, starring Tom Holland. The movie will be released in theaters on July 31, 2026.

articles.title: The Yorkshire skincare brand celebrating a second year on Sunday Times 100 list
articles.author: Marc Reeves
articles.summary: 47 Skin, founded by Nic Taylor, gains recognition for its skincare products, particularly the Anti-Blemish & Scar Repair Serum and Everyday Cleanser. The products feature Silver Chitoderm®, a patented ingredient known for its antibacterial and hydrating properties, which has garnered positive customer feedback for improving skin conditions.

articles.title: 47 Skin named one of UK's fastest-growing private companies for second year
articles.author: Head
articles.summary: Nic Taylor founded 47 Skin, a skincare brand featuring Silver Chitoderm, an antibacterial and hydrating ingredient. The product range includes the Anti-Blemish & Scar Repair Serum and Everyday Cleanser, and is available on the official 47 Skin site. Customer reviews show positive response to the product.

articles.title: Plume and AMT Launch SuperPod with Wi-Fi 7: A Technology Leap Forward for NCTC Members
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Plume Design launched a turnkey solution for faster streaming and stronger connections. Plume's SaaS platform also offers smarter management and support for service providers.

articles.title: Nobody's Child dress that 'skims the body without being too tight' now 23% off
articles.author: Branwen Jones
articles.summary: Nobody's Child is offering the Colorado Midi Dress at a discounted price of £50, reduced from £65 as part of a 23% off sale. The dress, crafted with sustainable materials like LENZING™ ECOVERO™ Viscose and organic cotton, features a scoop neck, a-line skirt, and is available in multiple colors.

articles.title: Buldak sauce spices up Panda Express chicken for dynamite flavor
articles.author: KIM MIN-YOUNG
articles.summary: Samyang Foods, the maker of Buldak ramyeon, is collaborating with Panda Express to launch a new menu item called Dynamite Sweet & Sour Chicken. This limited-time dish combines the heat of Buldak sauce with Cantonese-style sweet and sour sauce and will be available at select Panda Express locations through Oct. 7. Panda Express considers it the spiciest dish they have ever launched.

articles.title: Dirty soda trend arrives in Canada as 'Mormon Wives' series shakes up interest
articles.author: Tara Deschamps
articles.summary: Sip Soda Co. has launched in the Edmonton area, bringing the dirty soda trend to Alberta. Pop Culture Dirty Soda is selling the drinks at events around B.C.'s Lower Mainland. Crumbl has introduced dirty sodas to its Canadian stores, and Sip Soda Co. plans to franchise with a new drive-thru model across the country.

articles.title: Kanye West unveils new Yeezy footwear, priced at $20; will ship in 6-13 weeks
articles.author: Aaron A. Bedoya
articles.summary: The Yeezy brand has re-released the SLPRS (SL-01) footwear and Yeezy Slide (YS-01), both priced at $20 and available on yeezy.com. Additionally, Yeezy is introducing a new shoe-like slipper called SL-02 and high-heeled footwear, alongside the return of the Yeezy Pods. The website also features a range of clothing items, including shirts, jackets, underwear and socks.

articles.title: These 'astounding' bestselling earbuds are 80% off — and they have more than 53,000 reviews on Amazon
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Amazon Canada is offering Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds for $30, discounted by 80%. These earbuds feature noise-cancelling technology, up to 36 hours of battery life, and an ergonomic, waterproof design. Customers praise their sound quality, bass, and ease of pairing, although some note the battery life is shorter than expected.

articles.title: Anew Media Group, an AI Marketing Agency, Announces Major Development in AI Targeting for Local SEO and LLMs
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Anew Media Group updated its software with AI insights, Geo-targeting, and LLMs. This software is designed to help local businesses improve their SEO rankings and visibility in AI-generated search summaries. It allows businesses to choose keywords, track competitor strategies and optimize content, leading to more leads.

articles.title: Westside-owner Trent launches youth-centric 'Burnt Toast'
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Trent has launched a new fashion brand called 'Burnt Toast' in Bengaluru, targeting the youth fashion segment. The 2,500 sq. ft. store is located at MM Complex, No. 23, 100 Feet Ring Road, Banashankari. The brand aims to offer affordable, trend-forward pieces for young consumers.

articles.title: Dirty soda? New shop in Clinton brings the trend to Massachusetts
articles.author: Breana  Pitts
articles.summary: The Fountain in Clinton, Massachusetts, is introducing "dirty sodas" to its menu, inspired by a viral trend. Owner Lauren Nanof saw the trend on social media and decided to bring it to Massachusetts, offering customers a new beverage option. One of their popular drinks is "The Founder," a Dr. Pepper-based dirty soda.

articles.title: GSF chooses Morpeth for location of new branch
articles.author: Gary S. Francis
articles.summary: GSF Car Parts has expanded its services in the North East with a new branch in Morpeth, operating as a satellite site paired with the Newcastle branch. The new branch offers Click and Collect service with same-day pickup and aims to improve service and stock availability for customers and independent garages in the region.

articles.title: Organisers of Nigerian Marketing Awards kick-off for 2025, call for entries
articles.author: Daniel Obi
articles.summary: The Nigerian Marketing Awards has commenced this year's edition with entries opening on August 15, 2025. Two new categories, Best Use of AI in Marketing and Best Spice Brand, have been introduced to reflect evolving industry priorities and consumer trends. A '15% early bird discount' is available for submissions made by September 5, 2025.

articles.title: Someone Finally Made Chips That Taste Like Licking a 9-Volt Battery
articles.author: Ashley Fike
articles.summary: Rewind, a Dutch company, has launched tortilla chips designed to taste like licking a 9-volt battery, using a mix of citric acid, sodium bicarbonate, and mineral salts. These chips are part of a broader strategy rooted in nostalgia and are currently available in Dutch supermarkets. Rewind is aiming for a broader European release soon.

articles.title: Why AI Will Benefit ServiceTitan More Than Salesforce
articles.author: Joaquin Perrone
articles.summary: Zvoove is integrating AI into its vertical ERP platform to enhance existing features and workflows. They are also open to acquiring AI startups to quickly implement solutions and bolster their value proposition. This ensures they remain competitive and meet customer needs in the face of advancements in AI technology.

articles.title: IWISA No 1 extends Community Champions competition deadline - Over R240,000 in prizes up for grabs
articles.author: Wendy Dondolo
articles.summary: IWISA No 1 has extended the deadline for its Community Champions Competition to August 31, 2025, offering social entrepreneurs the opportunity to win over R240,000 in prizes. Finalists and winners also gain access to business mentorship and training, supporting the growth and impact of purpose-driven SMEs.

articles.title: Top 10 lightening deals on washing machines that you should not miss: Choose from the top brands
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, Bosch, Godrej, Haier, and Voltas Beko introduced new washing machine models. These machines feature advanced technologies such as AI Direct Drive, EcoBubble, and AI-DBT, with features like steam wash, hygiene steam, and inbuilt heaters for enhanced cleaning. The models cater to different household sizes and needs, offering energy efficiency and specialized wash programs.

articles.title: Nio's L90 Sales Are Soaring: Is It Time to Buy NIO Stock Now?
articles.author: Mohit Oberoi
articles.summary: Nio launched the L90 SUV under its Onvo sub-brand, competitively priced below $37,000. The L90 has quickly become one of the top 3 large SUVs in China based on insurance data, with Nio aiming to deliver over 10,000 units in August. Initial reviews are positive, highlighting its value for money, offering premium features at an affordable price.

articles.title: How AI Chatbots Can Provide Emotional Support To Customers
articles.author: Dr. Bin Tang
articles.summary: Noah Digital suggests companies can utilize AI Chatbots to provide emotional support and build customer loyalty. Strategies include empathetic language, sentiment detection to adjust the chatbot's tone based on customer emotion, and thoughtful personalization. The aim is to create AI interactions that leave customers feeling valued and understood, leading to increased trust and lifetime value.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon Unboxing और First Impression: क्या खरीदना चाहिए ये फोन?
articles.author: Produced by: प्रेम त्रिपाठी
articles.summary: Lava is introducing its new phone, the Blaze Dragon. The content focuses on the unboxing experience and initial impressions of this newly released device.

articles.title: This well-known Staten Island deli now serves beer
articles.author: Victoria  Priola
articles.summary: Plaza Bagels & Deli has expanded its offerings by acquiring a liquor license and introducing alcoholic beverages, including beer and canned hard seltzers. The deli has also added new items to its menu, such as the jalapeno cheddar bagel and pickle sandwiches, a healthy alternative where pickles replace bread.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G: Clean, Simple and Surprising
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone, featuring a clean software experience, a 120Hz display, and a Snapdragon processor. The new phone is priced at Rs 8,999.

articles.title: This NY 25-year-old ditched school, sold his shoe collection and opened his own business. How you can follow his lead
articles.author: Danielle Antosz
articles.summary: Brandon Hollingsworth opened Don's Laundry in Queens Village on December 31st. He invested personal savings to finance the opening. He hopes to provide quality service and inspire others.

articles.title: The OnePlus Buds 4 get noise cancelling right, but otherwise struggled to stand out for me
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus Buds 4 at $130/£119, positioning it as an affordable option packed with features like adaptive noise cancelling, spatial sound, and high-resolution Bluetooth. The OnePlus Buds 4 include an 11mm woofer and 6mm tweeter with a focus on delivering a V-shaped sound profile with punchy audio and capable noise cancelling.

articles.title: Best waffle makers for golden crispy perfection every time
articles.author: Alvina Wang/Best Reviews
articles.summary: The Cuisinart Vertical Belgian Waffle Maker is a uniquely designed appliance known for producing restaurant-quality waffles, featuring quick and even heating, locking handle, and light/sound indicators. The Hamilton Beach Family Belgian-Style Waffle Maker is ideal for large-batch cooking, yielding four waffles at a time in about 5 minutes. The Dash Individual Waffle Maker is an affordable, lightweight, and portable option that cooks a single round waffle in approximately 4 minutes.

articles.title: Top external solid-state drives for reliable storage
articles.author: Alvina Wang/Best Reviews
articles.summary: Samsung offers the T5 Portable SSD 1TB, a small and lightweight drive with fast transfer speeds, available in multiple capacities and colors. SanDisk's Extreme Portable SSD 500GB is a durable option with high read and write speeds and drop, dust, and water resistance. Adata's SE880 Portable SSD 1TB features a potential transfer speed of up to 20Gbps and is waterproof, dustproof, and shock-resistant.

articles.title: 27 Easy Tips To Help You Look More Polished
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: The article features a curated selection of fashion and beauty products available on Amazon, emphasizing their unique benefits and user experiences. Some of the products mentioned include: Mise En Scene Perfect Serum, I Dew Care dry shampoo, Maybelline Dream BB Cream, Supergoop! Glowscreen SPF 40, Cake Beauty The Curl Friend Defining Cream, Hanes wire-free bra, Schick dermaplaning razor, Goody spin hair pins, Fanola No Yellow Purple Shampoo, L'Oreal Paris Root Cover Up Concealer Spray and other clothing items such as linen pants, waffle-knit lounge set, tiered maxi skirt and tennis dress. These products aim to solve everyday needs with innovative solutions and practical upgrades.

articles.title: Guidance for EEA and UK Customers: Yahoo! JAPAN Content Writing Services, No Extras or Comments
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: The article discusses content writing services for Yahoo! JAPAN, catering to EEA and UK businesses. Services encompass keyword research, localization, SEO optimization, and creation of blog posts, website copy, product descriptions, and social media content for Yahoo! JAPAN platforms. A case study highlights how localized product descriptions and content led to a significant increase in organic traffic and sales for a UK-based retailer.

articles.title: Danny Dyer says he's 'proud to be a tosser'
articles.author: Neil Shaw
articles.summary: Deliveroo is launching its 'Freshness Promise,' a service guaranteeing customers their money back if groceries delivered through the app are not fresh. The service covers a wide range of fresh grocery essentials from nationwide supermarkets like ASDA, Co-op, Sainsbury's and Morrisons. Actor Danny Dyer is featured in the campaign promoting this new initiative.

articles.title: A 25-year-old from Queens dropped out of school, sold his sneaker collection and opened his own laundromat. Here's how you can follow his playbook
articles.author: Danielle Antosz
articles.summary: Brandon Hollingsworth opened Don's Laundry in Queens Village on December 31st, following in his parents' footsteps who also own laundromats. He sold his sneaker collection to pay for the lawyer who helped him finalize the deal. Brandon hopes to inspire others to chase their dreams through his new laundromat.

articles.title: SOLUM Launches Electronic Shelf Label Solutions 'Newton A' and 'Newton Core Plus'
articles.summary: SOLUM has launched two new Electronic Shelf Label (ESL) solutions, Newton A and Newton Core Plus. Newton A features a 4-color EPD display, LED indicator, and long battery life. Newton Core Plus offers faster updates, longer battery life, and is available in various sizes.

articles.title: 5 Phones Brands That Made the Leap From Old School to Android
articles.summary: Nokia has returned to the Nigerian market with Android smartphones like the Nokia C32 and G60 5G. Motorola has also re-entered the market with phones like the Moto Razr 40 Ultra. BlackBerry briefly returned with Android devices like the BlackBerry Priv.

articles.title: DC-Based 1/ip x 1500 Class-C SEO
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Blazing Switch provides a premium residential ISP service. The service supports use cases like code/software/web testing, data scraping, educational purposes, gaming, research, search engine marketing, social media, streaming, and VPN.

articles.title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Lead: Success Means Building from Scratch, Not Copying Big Tech
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5 with a "real-time router" feature that automatically selects the most suitable AI model for each query.  They also removed the 'model chooser' in ChatGPT due to user confusion, which has been replaced by more seamless routing and have plans to reintroduce the older model based on user feedback. This reflects OpenAI's strategy of rapid iteration based on user interaction.

articles.title: 36 Space-Saving Products For Small Apartment Living
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new home organization products designed to maximize space and minimize clutter. These products range from kitchen solutions like mug organizers and magnetic stove shelves, to closet solutions like Wonder Hangers and hanging vacuum bags, and living space solutions like lift-top tables and compact sectionals. These products provide innovative storage and organizational solutions for various areas of the home.

articles.title: How Osazomon Imarenezor is pioneering AI-driven skincare for people of color
articles.author: Ifeoma Okeke-Korieocha
articles.summary: Osaz, a beauty-tech company, offers skincare solutions, including the 'Osaz Tinted Sunscreen', tailored for melanin-rich skin using AI-driven personalized assessments. The company focuses on providing the 'holy trinity' of dermatology: retinoic acid, hyperpigmentation cream with antioxidants, and sunscreen, addressing individual skin needs and common skin concerns. Osaz also has sunscreen products for men and younger demographics in the pipeline.

articles.title: AWS expands startup assistance program
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: AWS launched the APN Global Startup Program last year. This year, AWS is expanding that offering and announced updates to the program at AWS re:Invent.

articles.title: World's first retail cabin operated fully by robot opens in Beijing
articles.summary: Beijing Galaxy Bot launched "Galbot", the world's first retail cabin completely serviced by a robot, in Beijing. Galbot handles all beverage sales tasks, including receiving clients, taking orders, and fetching products and interacts with customers in multiple languages. The cabin is expected to serve 2,000 clients and 500 orders per day, with plans for expansion and a more diverse product selection in the future.

articles.title: OpenAI launches GPT-5, its most advanced AI model yet
articles.author: Teresia Karanja
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched GPT-5, its most advanced AI model, boasting improved speed, accuracy, and capabilities. The model is available to all ChatGPT users, with paid subscribers receiving broader access for $200 per month. Anthropic also rolled out an updated version of its Claude chatbot.

articles.title: Migration To Next.Js For Improved Speed & Performance
articles.summary: Next.js Development Services are transforming web application development by offering faster load times and improved SEO. Businesses migrating to Next.js report enhanced performance, scalability, and user satisfaction. Real-world examples demonstrate significant improvements in page load speed, conversion rates, and bounce rates after migrating to Next.js.

articles.title: 48 Alternatives To Expensive Products If You Have Michelin Star Taste But A McDonald's Budget
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article presents a list of affordable alternatives to popular and expensive products from brands like Lululemon, Skims, Gucci, and others. These range from clothing and accessories to beauty products and home goods, offering consumers budget-friendly options with similar features and styles.

articles.title: ChatGPT boss says to succeed at OpenAI, be ready to build from scratch, not copy Big Tech
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5 last Thursday with mixed reviews and replaced the model picker in ChatGPT with a 'real-time router' that automatically chooses the best model for a user's request. The company deliberately releases features before they are fully refined to gather real-world feedback.

articles.title: EazyPC: The Startup Redefining Online Refurbished Laptop Buying in India
articles.author: Mahender
articles.summary: EazyPC, a startup based in Noida, has introduced a new approach to buying refurbished laptops online. They offer transparency through video calls allowing customers to inspect laptops before purchase, rigorous manual testing by technicians, and a 'scratchless promise' guaranteeing excellent cosmetic condition. EazyPC exclusively focuses on high-quality commercial series laptops and provides personalized guidance to ensure customers find the perfect match for their needs.

articles.title: Trump demands his dismissal, Intel chief 'departs' for the White House
articles.author: Al Trade Center
articles.summary: OpenAI has restored GPT-4o. This action follows user criticism.

articles.title: Eevezary announced on the 11th that it will introduce a new online-only brand called "ON-EVZARY," wh..
articles.author: Seo Jung-Won
articles.summary: Eevezari has launched a new online-only brand called ON-EVZARY, exclusive to its mall. This new brand introduces three types of wool-based bed pads: Basic Wool Pad, Standard Wool Pad, and Premium Wool Pad. The launch aims to cater to diverse customer lifestyles and leverage mall data for targeted product development.

articles.title: BYD's Yangwang U9 Track Edition breaks cover with an incredible 2220kW of power
articles.author: Marton Pettendy
articles.summary: BYD is releasing a Track Edition of its Yangwang U9 electric vehicle. This version builds upon the original with enhanced features, including a 960kW quad-motor powertrain, a claimed 0-100km/h time of 2.36 seconds, and electric air suspension enabling 'tank turns' and pothole jumping.

articles.title: I tried out the 4 new ChatGPT personalities. The 'cynic' was funny — but the 'robot' was my favorite.
articles.author: Henry Chandonnet
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5 with new "personalities" for ChatGPT, including "cynic," "robot," "listener," and "nerd," offering users diverse chatbot interactions. These personalities, currently in text chat and soon in voice mode, aim to reduce sycophancy and provide varied responses to user prompts and requests.

articles.title: Xiaomi Unveils First Washer Dryer in Singapore: Smart, Sleek, and Built for Modern Homes
articles.author: Irone Kim
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched its first washer dryer in Singapore, the Mijia Front Load Washer Dryer 10.5kg. This appliance features a 10.5kg washing and 7kg drying capacity, smart technology via the Xiaomi Home app, and is available for SGD 599 at mi.com and Xiaomi Stores.

articles.title: How Samsung washing machines make every drop of detergent count
articles.author: Times LIVE
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the OMO Wash Days campaign, promoting the intelligent features of its washing machines. These features include EcoBubble technology for cool water cleaning, AI Wash for intelligent cycle adjustments, and Auto Dispense for automatic detergent dispensing. These innovations aim to improve detergent performance, reduce energy usage, and simplify laundry routines.

articles.title: Five new Android features coming this winter
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Android will introduce five new features this winter. These features represent updates to the Android operating system.

articles.title: Wallpaper Worlds: Design AI Backgrounds for Fantasy Bedrooms and Dreamy Studios
articles.author: Ripples Nigeria
articles.summary: Dreamina introduces AI-powered tools that allow users to design custom wallpapers, logos, and stickers. The tools include an AI photo generator for creating fantasy wallpapers, an AI logo generator for personalizing spaces, and a free AI art generator for designing matching stickers, enabling immersive and personalized interior design.

articles.title: How to Turn Your Security Camera Into an All-Purpose Home Care Tool
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Hyve security cameras with AI detection features can recognize packages and allow users to give delivery instructions. Yale's smart locks can integrate with Nest Doorbell and use facial recognition to automatically unlock for family members, enhancing convenience and security.

articles.title: Local SEO Services In Ghaziabad ~ Thedigitalcurve Solutions
articles.summary: The Digital Curve offers Local SEO services in Ghaziabad. Their expert team optimizes Google Business Profiles, local keywords, citations, and location-based content. This helps businesses appear in local search results and attract nearby customers.

articles.title: 23 Target Skincare Products Future You Wants You To Try
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: Tula has a face cleanser that sells every 30 seconds. Good Molecules offers a hyaluronic acid serum and a Yerba Mate wake-up eye gel. Honest Beauty provides a hydrogel moisturizer. Neutrogena markets makeup-removing wipes, while Aquaphor has a healing ointment. Black Girl Sunscreen has launched a SPF 30 sunscreen. Pacifica offers a vitamin C booster serum, and Hero Cosmetics sells a glow balm.

articles.title: These 4 phones will drastically reduce your screen time
articles.author: Doug Aamoth
articles.summary: Light Phone III, the evolution of simplicity, features a matte AMOLED display and modern comforts like 5G connectivity, available for preorder at $699 with September shipping. Minimal Phone, priced between $400-$500, introduces a QWERTY keyboard and E Ink screen, running a custom Android version designed for focused tasks. Wisephone II, based on a Samsung phone, features a modified Android system free of social media and browsers, requiring a Wisephone service plan.

articles.title: American Standard Design Award 2026: Calling APAC Design Students to Reimagine the Bathroom
articles.summary: American Standard launched the fourth edition of the American Standard Design Award (ASDA) 2026. This initiative challenges young designers to create bathrooms of the future, addressing evolving needs.

articles.title: Samsung's fingerprint-secured T7 Touch SSD drops to $160 for 1TB
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Samsung launched the T7 Touch SSD. The new SSD helps keep user data secure until unlocked.

articles.title: மேட் பிளாக் நிறத்தில் 'கிராண்டு விட்டாரா பேண்டம் பிளாக்' மாடலை அறிமுகப்படுத்தியுள்ளது மாருதி சுஸூகி!
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki debuted Phantom Blaq with Matte Black finish. This launch celebrates 10 years of the Nexa chain.

articles.title: Slay Every Sauce and Soup With This $100 Stick Blender
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Braun introduces a new powerful and easy-to-use immersion blender. This product is positioned as an essential kitchen upgrade.

articles.title: Tech-forward ice cream trucks to take orders in Las Vegas
articles.author: Katie Ann McCarver
articles.summary: Scream Truck, a tech-forward ice cream truck service, is launching in Las Vegas by mid-September 2025. The service utilizes proprietary software for pre-marketing, order aggregation, and location-based routing, offering on-demand, personalized soft serve experiences. The company aims to have 1,000 trucks nationwide by 2030-2032 and potentially expand into other food delivery concepts.

articles.title: Related stocks are strong on the news that Samyang Foods' "buldak sauce" is cooperating with Panda E..
articles.author: Jonghwa Lee
org: Samyang Round Square Panda Express Cooperation News
articles.summary: Samyang Foods and Panda Express have collaborated to launch 'Dynamite Sweet and Sour Chicken,' a new menu item featuring a spicy buldak sauce. This menu will be available at select Panda Express locations in 10 U.S. cities until October 7. Samyang Foods intends to expand globally targeting spicy flavor enthusiasts.

articles.title: 35 Budget-Friendly Products You'll Love
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article presents a diverse range of new products. Affresh introduces washing machine tablets. Catrice launches 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener designed with color-adapting formula. Anua releases heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil. WD-40 introduces a more convenient pen version of their product.

articles.title: NING Opens Service Experience Centers in Asia
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NING Service, an independent aftermarket brand under CATL, launched its Brand Day and opened a flagship experience center in Shanghai and its first overseas store in Bangkok. NING Service also launched its CTP repair service utilizing CATL original equipment components and a non-destructive testing device that can complete fault detection in just 15 minutes with high accuracy.

articles.title: With over 3,000 horsepower, this Chinese electric supercar is set to become the world's most powerful
articles.author: Ynet
articles.summary: BYD plans to introduce an extreme variant of its Yangwang U9 model.

articles.title: Toyota is leasing one of the best new hybrid cars for under $300/month. What to know about their national sales event
articles.author: Commercial Appeal
articles.summary: Toyota is updating the 2026 Toyota bZ, giving its renamed SUV big increases in power and range, and new features. A new national sales event features the popular hybrid, which includes an excellent standard safety suite.

articles.title: PR: GameSir Launches G7 Pro: A Next-Gen Controller Engineered for Precision, Performance, and Platform Versatility
articles.author: Armchair Arcade
articles.summary: GameSir has launched the G7 Pro, a next-generation controller designed for precision, performance, and platform versatility. This new controller, refined from the G7 lineage, offers tri-mode connectivity and Hall Effect technology and is available on Amazon and other retailers.

articles.title: Yachting Ventures launches Innovation Zone at Southampton International Boat Show (BMF - British Marine Federation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Yachting Ventures (YV) will launch the Innovation Zone at the 2025 Southampton International Boat Show (SIBS). This launch introduces a new service or platform at the event.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Grok Imagine AI feature now available for free on Android: What is it ...
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Elon Musk's Grok Imagine AI feature is now available for free on Android devices. This indicates the release or launch of the Grok Imagine AI service on a new platform, making it accessible to a wider user base.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 is the ultimate foldable phone for travelers
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, its latest flagship foldable smartphone. The Fold7 features an array of cameras, vivid display and enhanced AI capabilities. It is a thinner and lighter upgrade from the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and is now available.

articles.title: GoTo Foods® and DoorDash Take to the Skies with Wing's Drone Delivery Service
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: GoTo Foods is partnering with DoorDash to launch drone delivery services. This initiative aims to modernize its brand portfolio, including Auntie Anne's and Jamba, by expanding accessibility and driving frequency through drone delivery.

articles.title: Oppo K13 Turbo series with dual-camera, built-in fan launched in India
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Oppo launched a new product on Monday, August 11.

articles.title: Balltze, the Bonk Dog, Launches Today on Solana — Created by the Legendary MYRO Deployer
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Balltze officially launched and started live trading on August 11, 2025.

articles.title: LG to Introduce Advanced AI Home Innovations at IFA 2025 (LG Corp)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: LG Electronics will showcase its new AI Home Solution at IFA 2025 in Berlin, Germany, from September 5 to 9. The company's presentation will be under the theme "LG AI Appliances Orchestra."

articles.title: M&S is the go-to for kids school uniform thanks to 100-day returns policy
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: M&S uniforms have passed the hand-me-down test, suggesting durability and new information about the product line.

articles.title: JAECOO J5 Makes Explosive Middle East Debut In Riyadh, With UAE Launch Scheduled For August 13
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: OMODA&JAECOO launched the JAECOO 5 in Riyadh. The JAECOO 5 introduces a new vision for the light off-road SUV segment. This launch strengthens OMODA&JAECOO's regional footprint.
